meanings.definition: A two-wheeled vehicle with an engine.
meanings.sent1: I saw many motorbikes on the road today.
meanings.sent2: Motorbikes are popular for commuting in the city.
meanings.sent3: The motorbikes in the race zoomed past like colorful streaks.
meanings.sent4: In the busy city, motorbikes are the swift messengers of traffic.
meanings.sent5: The sound of motorbikes echoed through the valley, signaling the start of the race.

meanings.definition: To ride or travel on a motorbike.
meanings.sent1: She loves to motorbike through the countryside on weekends.
meanings.sent2: We will motorbike to the beach for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: He decided to motorbike to work to avoid the traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The friends planned to motorbike across the country for an adventure.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, they would motorbike along the coastal road, feeling the wind in their hair.
